Address.value: 9466 GEORGIA AVENUE,SUITE 124, SILVER SPRING, Maryland, 20910, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BTCS Inc is engaged in the business of hosting an online e-commerce marketplace where consumers can purchase merchandise using Digital Assets, including bitcoin. The company focuses on blockchain and Digital Asset ecosystems. The firm operates a beta e-commerce marketplace, which accepts a range of digital currencies, has designed a beta secure digital currency storage solution BTCS Wallet.
